ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (Actually, TheCode, doing that many attacks is impossible to defend against, you can t really do that all one after another after another.  And how is a head

Received: from KSLawdogg@... by csimo02.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v26.7.) id a.25.63cd369 (4566) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Sat, 27 May 2000 01:53:19 -0400 (EDT)

Date: Sat, 27 May 2000 01:53:18 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 101
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Actually, TheCode, doing that many attacks is impossible to defend against, 
you can't really do that all one after another after another.  And how is a 
head attacking me?  You transformed back to robot mode, and the robot mode 
wouldn't be all better, it'd still have damage, and I don't think you posted 
for Oblitertron throwing the sword at Radistor's sternum, and you didn't post 
for the two charges going down at Suukie I belive)

Oblitertron/Nemesis Enforcer/Koga Shuko/Hades/Anubis/Unitron/Scattershot:

The gestalt yelled in pain as a piece of his chest was ripped open, 
Oblitertron held up an arm to block some of the attacks, stumbling backwards 
a dozen yards, tripping (kind of sitting down on the People's base, have to 
post damage for that), getting up, he fired a combo of optic blasts and 
continous flames, raising his plasma rifle firing off three shots at 
Radistor's left side.
-------------
Nemesis raised his missile launcher, firing one of his last rockets off at 
Radistor's left knee.
-------------
Koga Shuko raised his own missile launcher, firing off a missile at 
Radistor's left foot.
-------------
Hades sighed, firing off a missile from his launcher at Radistor's chin.
-------------
Anubis raised his plasma rifle, firing off two bolts, at the same time firing 
a rocket off at Radistor's sternum.
-------------
Scattershot, trying to remember what he had in subspace, took out his last 
powerful bomb, equivelant to three rockets from a missile launcher, dropping 
it down, set to explode on impact, at Radistor's left shoulder, taking out 
his machine gun with exploding bullets, smiling like an idiot as he flew 
through the air.
